Description: Book of the Dead of Padiamenet; Hieratic text in red and black ink; full colour offering-vignette.
Curator's comments: Lenzo, G. 2023. The Book of the Dead in the Third Intermediate Period, in: Lucarelli, R. and M.A. Stadler (eds), The Oxford Handbook of the Egyptian Book of the Dead (online edn, Oxford Academic, 20 June 2023), 83-84.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (154)
Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no.27)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134529) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134529)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bleached, fractured, loss Black ink Red ink Pigment: copper degradation, discolouration, loss Backed: brown paper displayed in Room 62 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: Filmoplast T self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
